title: Ticket #2977: Manually compile on Rhel-6 32-bit (for bootstrapping)
description:
We need a port of Condor on Rhel-6 32-bit to begin the Batlab bootstrapping process.

Batlab already has a machine installed and ready to use. Unfortunately I don't know the hostname and I don't know how to find it. You'll need to ask Dan Rao.

-scot
remarks:
hostname is exec-107. and clipped port of 7.7.6 has been completed. 
/home/johnkn/build/condor-7.7.6-rhel6.2-stripped.tar.gz
/home/johnkn/build/condor-7.7.6-uw_development.rhel6.2.i686.rpm
creator: kronenfe
